title: Software Development Engineer
description: Worked on React-based UI components. Built features and learned responsive design and accessibility.
responsibilities: Working as part of the redesign team for migrating an established enterprise software product with a high volume of financial data flow to a new interface and back-end.
Creating reusable components for Web Pages using React, TypeScript, AG-Grid and Redux for state management.
Establishing best practices for the code base as a project goes on, using ES-Lint to maintain clean and consistent code throughout the project.
Writing Unit Tests using Jest and react-testing-library to ensure high code quality.
Involved in wring back-end micro-services using Java and connecting the micro-services to the front-end using REST APIs.
Have worked on Development of JIRA Tickets, involved in planning the Sprint and given Demos in Sprint Review.

title: System Engineer
description: Developed modern interfaces using TypeScript, implemented unit tests and CI/CD deployment with the team.
responsibilities: Designed and developed responsive and dynamic web applications using ReactJS, ensuring high performance and a seamless user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement new features and improve existing functionality, maintaining clean and reusable code practices.
Diagnosed and resolved critical issues reported by clients, consistently meeting tight deadlines and maintaining high-quality standards.
Created and optimised PL/SQL scripts with minimal errors, enhancing back-end functionality.
Proficient in writing and executing complex SQL queries to meet business requirements.
Performed seamless code migration across different environments, ensuring continuity and reliability during transitions.

title: Frontend developer
description: Developed modern interfaces using TypeScript, implemented unit tests and CI/CD deployment with the team.
responsibilities: Worked as a Web Developer to develop web pages by using scripting languages.

title: Android Developer
description: Developed modern interfaces using TypeScript, implemented unit tests and CI/CD deployment with the team.
